short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerses users in the mysterious allure of a black cat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Midnight Gaze"  immerses users in the mysterious allure of a black cat's piercing blue eyes against a deep, shadowy background. Perfect for those who appreciate dark, elegant designs with a touch of mystique, this theme highlights the enigmatic beauty of feline eyes while creating a calm, focused browsing experience.
